QuestData.Title: Whispers of a Frightened World
QuestData.Description: Champion, Magni needs your help!$b$bThe Speaker has a message for you, perhaps from Azeroth herself. He seems to be having trouble understanding her, but I'm sure he can explain everything better.$b$bHe said he was in Sholazar Basin, in Northrend. He should be contacting you shortly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Magni in Sholazar Basin and hear the warning.
QuestData.CompletionText: Yes, $n? What news do you bring?
QuestData.RewardText: This warning is an ill omen indeed, $n. It seems the fate of Azeroth is tied to that of Argus, the homeworld of the Legion.$b$bWe must uncover the Dark Titan's plan! I believe the Speaker's connection to the world soul will prove crucial to our efforts.$b$bStay vigilant, $ct. We must trust in Magni's guidance... and Azeroth's as well.

Objectives.Objective: Take the Dalaran portal to Wyrmrest Temple
Meet Magni in The Maker's Overlook
